00024 #ifndef _SPECTRUMITERATOR_HPP_
00025 #define _SPECTRUMITERATOR_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00029 #include "MSData.hpp"
00030 #include "utility/misc/IntegerSet.hpp"
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace msdata {
00035 
00036 
00037 using pwiz::util::IntegerSet;
00038 
00039 
00040 ///
00041 /// SpectrumIterator provides convenient iteration through a set of scans in a SpectrumList.
00042 ///
00043 /// Its behavior is similar to istream_iterator.  In particular:
00044 /// - the default constructed SpectrumIterator() is a past-the-end marker
00045 /// - references to the current Spectrum are invalidated by preincrement
00046 ///
00047 /// Because SpectrumIterator holds a copy of the current Spectrum internally,
00048 /// copy assignment and postincrement have been disabled.
00049 /// 
00050 /// Iteration may be customized in a number of ways:
00051 /// - clients may specify an IntegerSet of scan numbers through which to iterate. 
00052 /// - clients may specify a Sieve to filter based on Spectrum fields. 
00053 /// - clients may specify whether binary data is retrieved in the Spectrum object (default==true)
00054 ///
00055 /// For usage examples, see SpectrumIteratorTest.cpp
00056 ///
00057 class PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumIterator
00058 {
00059     public:
00060 
00061     /// interface for filtering based on ScanInfo
00062     class PWIZ_API_DECL Sieve
00063     {
00064         public:
00065         virtual bool accept(const Spectrum& spectrum) const {return true;}
00066         virtual ~Sieve(){}
00067     };
00068 
00069     /// SpectrumIterator configuration -- note that constructors allow automatic 
00070     /// conversion from IntegerSet or Sieve to Config
00071     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00072     {
00073         const IntegerSet* scanNumbers;
00074         const Sieve* sieve;
00075         bool getBinaryData;
00076 
00077         Config()
00078         :   scanNumbers(0), sieve(0), getBinaryData(true)
00079         {}
00080 
00081         Config(const IntegerSet& _scanNumbers, bool _getBinaryData = true)
00082         :   scanNumbers(&_scanNumbers), sieve(0), getBinaryData(_getBinaryData)
00083         {}
00084         
00085         Config(const Sieve& _sieve, bool _getBinaryData = true)
00086         :   scanNumbers(0), sieve(&_sieve), getBinaryData(_getBinaryData)
00087         {}
00088     };
00089 
00090     /// special default object for marking past-the-end 
00091     SpectrumIterator();
00092 
00093     /// constructor for normal initialization of the iterator
00094     SpectrumIterator(const SpectrumList& spectrumList,
00095                      const Config& config = Config());
00096 
00097     /// constructor using MSData object 
00098     SpectrumIterator(const MSData& msd,
00099                      const Config& config = Config());
00100 
00101     /// copy constructor
00102     SpectrumIterator(const SpectrumIterator&);
00103 
00104     /// \name input iterator interface
00105     //@{
00106     SpectrumIterator& operator++();
00107     const Spectrum& operator*() const;
00108     const Spectrum* operator->() const;
00109     bool operator==(const SpectrumIterator& that) const;
00110     bool operator!=(const SpectrumIterator& that) const;
00111     //@}
00112 
00113     /// \name standard iterator typedefs 
00114     //@{
00115     typedef std::input_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00116     typedef Spectrum value_type;
00117     typedef int difference_type;
00118     typedef value_type* pointer;
00119     typedef value_type& reference;
00120     //@}
00121 
00122     private:
00123 
00124     class Impl;
00125     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00126 
00127     /// no copying
00128     SpectrumIterator& operator=(const SpectrumIterator&);
00129 
00130     /// don't do this -- avoid temporary copy 
00131     SpectrumIterator operator++(int); 
00132 };
00133 
00134 
00135 } // namespace msdata
00136 } // namespace pwiz
00137 
00138 
00139 #endif // _SPECTRUMITERATOR_HPP_
